summary: SummaryGhd's professional Chronos Curve Max wand with a 1.5" barrel that uses curl-responsive technology for up to 3x faster curling & HD results that last all day. Recommended for shiny, loose waves.
details: DetailsBenefitsPerfect for frizz-free curls and waves that lasts all dayNo extreme heat damage*50% more shine*Up to 50% smoother results*Recommended for longer hair lengths and first time stylersFeaturesghd's curl-responsive technology reacts to dynamic curling actions and responds to your hair needs for ultra-fast curling and high-definition results1.5" barrel makes it ideal for styling long hair lengths while making it easy to use for first-time stylersAnodised coating that provides grip to make styling effortlessLatest generation ceramic heater ensures the optimum styling temperature of 365°F is maintained across the entire barrel at all timesItem 2639018How To UseSection hair and take a 2-inch section.At the root, place wand into root with cool tip facing downward.Flat wrap hair around the barrel twice. Glide towards and away from the head for 3-5 seconds.Release curl and repeat technique, alternating the direction of each curl.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Section hair and take a 2-inch section.At the root, place wand into root with cool tip facing downward.Flat wrap hair around the barrel twice. Glide towards and away from the head for 3-5 seconds.Release curl and repeat technique, alternating the direction of each curl.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Best curling iron I've owned
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This curling iron is effective at smoothing my hair for frizz free curls that last all day. It creates a variety of loose waves, making it perfect for versatile styles. It feels durable and very well made.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments:
The ghd Chronos Curve Max Wand is a premium styling tool that truly delivers professional-level results. Its durability stands out immediately—the build feels solid and long-lasting, making it a reliable choice for daily use. Despite its robust design, it also offers good portability; the wand is lightweight enough to pack for travel without feeling bulky.

When it comes to versatility, this tool impresses by creating everything from loose, voluminous waves to defined curls, adapting to different hair types and styling needs with ease. The packaging is sleek and modern, reflecting the brand's luxury aesthetic while also being practical for storage and gifting. Most importantly, the wand's effectiveness is undeniable—it heats up quickly, maintains an even temperature, and delivers long-lasting curls with minimal effort.

Overall, the ghd Chronos Curve Max Wand blends performance with elegance, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone serious about styling.

reviews.headline: So lovely!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
Really sturdy and sleek! Works great on my wavy hair and it's super easy to use and get it going!
Definitely looking forward to try more hair tools from this line

reviews.headline: Go to wand
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This curling tool is amazing! I love how quickly heats up and it's easy to use. I have really long hair and this made it easy to curl or wave my hair. It feels like it will last a long time

reviews.headline: Worked well enough on curls.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] As someone with tight ish curls I was a bit skeptical of if this barrel was gonna be able to hold a curl in my hair or fall out but it worked for a looser curl. It's also portable.

reviews.headline: Great curling wand
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The curling wand itself is sleek and feels very durable/good quality. I love the feature that it has where it beeps when it is warmed up all the way, so I don't have to wait around for it to be hot enough. It is easy to use and made for natural looking bigger curls! I will definitely be using more often to give my hair a little umph!

reviews.headline: Holy grail hair tool
reviews.comments: I received this item free as part of a promotion for my honest review. This is a beautiful hair tool. Your hair remains very soft, bouncy and voluminous. Like you've just stepped out of a salon. The device is strong and durable. The same device can be used to create multiple styles. I LOVE GHD! hair tool. Your hair remains very soft, bouncy and voluminous. Like you've just stepped out of a salon. The device is strong and durable. The same device can be used to create multiple styles. I LOVE GHD

reviews.headline: Holy grail hair tool!
reviews.comments: This is a beautiful hair tool. Your hair remains very soft, bouncy and voluminous. Like you've just stepped out of a salon. The device is strong and durable. The same device can be used to create multiple styles. I LOVE GHD!

reviews.headline: Efficient
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The GHD Curve Max Curl Wand is honestly pretty great for getting loose, voluminous curls. It heats up fast, and the big barrel is perfect for natural waves that actually last. It's lightweight and easy to use, and the cool tip makes it safer to handle while styling. Overall, it just gets the job done without a ton of effort, and the curls hold up for hours. Definitely a good choice if you want a tool that's reliable and works well.

reviews.headline: Nice curler!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Nice curler!. It heats to a set temperature that is not controllable, but is enough to curl your hair in few seconds. It can get really hot, so I recommend to use a glove to prevent burns. Love the size of the curler, it gives a good waive, perfect size the give a beachy look!. I'm in love with this brand!. It heats up really fast, and I did my hair in less than 20min, so it was really quick.

reviews.headline: This product was okay
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This wand was okay. Thick barrel was great, heated up fast. Not my personal favorite but it's not the worst.

reviews.headline: Great wand
reviews.comments: First time I've used a curling wand in ages and this one is fabulous! It heats up to the desired temp very quickly and the 360 swivel cord keeps you from getting tangled and frustrated. It creates voluminous waves without any frizz. Super versatile for glamorous or casual waves

reviews.headline: Great Wand
reviews.comments: This is my wife's first GHD product. Although she struggled a bit at first, she loves it now that she's figured out what works for her. It heats up very quickly and is easy to use, even for beginners. She tried a few curls to test it out and was very pleased with the results her hair doesn't have to endure extreme heat, yet it still achieves great volume. The design feels sleek and lightweight, making it comfortable to handle for longer styling sessions. What impressed her most is how smooth her hair looks afterwards, with no frizz and a lasting shine that holds throughout the day. For someone who's still learning, this tool gives professional-quality results without the frustration. Definitely worth the investment, and she's already excited to keep experimenting with new styles.

reviews.headline: Great for Loose Waves
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I need more practice with it but I attempted to do loose waves in my hair. The wand itself heated up much quicker than other curling wands I have used. It added life and shine to my hair. I recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Laugh and undulate in an incredible way
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My friend loves this hair curling machine because it makes a spectacular transformation to her hair, it is incredible as laughter and waving her hair in a spectacular way, totally recommended do not miss trying it

reviews.headline: Easy to use even for a newbie
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This was such a pleasant surprise to use! I have naturally wavy hair and I basically never use heat tools so I was nervous I wouldn't do it right. But it was very easy and quick to use. Love how it has a signal that it is hot enough to use as someone with minimal experience. Also nice that it includes a protective glove. Here is a side by side of my 2nd day hair next to the end results. I have a lot of hair and it took me less than 10 mins to do the part of my hair shown. I'm sure someone with experience would breeze through even faster. It's so nice to know I have a tool now for those situations where I want my hair to look a little bit more sleek!

reviews.headline: Fast heating, high quality curling wand
reviews.comments: I received the ghd Chronos Curve Max Wand for free in exchange for my honest review. This is a really nice high quality curling wand. It worked well to give me beautiful loose curls. It took about 45 minutes (I have long hair) as someone who is far from professional at curling hair. I do wish it came with a "how to" guide to show newbies and remind people who haven't curled hair with a wand in a while how to do it. The glove that comes with it is pretty low quality; it doesn't fit well at all and is awkward to use. I have a glove from another well known brand that I used instead that actually fits properly. It's incredible how quickly this wand heats up; you don't have to wait around for long. Overall, I'm extremely happy with this wand, would recommend it and look forward to using it a lot more.

reviews.headline: Good but pricey
reviews.comments: The GHD Chronos Curve Max Curling Wand is a premium styling tool ideal for individuals with long or thick hair seeking voluminous, long-lasting waves. Its advanced technology and user-friendly design make it a worthwhile investment for those desiring salon-quality results at home.

reviews.headline: Needs Improvement
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My wife has a similar curling wand at a similar pricepoint so she was very excited to try out the ghd Chronos Curve Max Wand. The product promises "curl-responsive technology for up to 3x faster curling & HD results with shiny, loose waves that last all day".

The wand promises to have no extreme heat damage but from the start she was very concerned with the wand's high heat that was not adjustable. The product includes an Aurora Glove to protect the hand from burns but the thin fabric did not feel heavy enough. My wife was still feeling too much heat coming through the glove for her comfort while using the wand. She went and got a much thicker heat-resistant glove that came with another styling tool and used that glove to finish styling her hair. Even after watching multiple product usage videos she still could not achieve the results shown by the company. The waves were very loose and did not stay in place long. By the time she had finished styling the other half of her head, the waves on the first side had already fallen out. It took her three total uses for every section of her hair to achieve the one single hair style shown in the after photos. Within a half hour, most of the waves she had worked so hard to set had already disappeared. This style-fallout is not normal for her with other heat styling tools.

I did not like the smell of her hair after use. It had an almost burnt smell. She is not sure if that is from the heat protectant spray she used or not, but I have never noticed the smell before. Her final verdict is that it would work much better on extremely long and very thick hair. She thinks the tool needs the ability to adjust the heat beyond the default 365°F setting with at least two additional lower temp options. She also thinks the included glove is useless. It needs to be much thicker like the ones included by rival brands. The only bonuses she noted were the incredibly fast heating cycle, the no-tangle cord, and the sleek look of the product.

reviews.headline: A Great Wand, Even Better Curls
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The GHD Chronos Wand really impressed me. The wand heats up super quickly, which makes styling a breeze, and it gives my hair a ton of volume, perfect for that effortless, beachy look.

That said, I'm not a huge fan of the tapered end of the barrel. I personally prefer a barrel that's straight all the way through, as it gives more uniform curls. But even with that small quibble, the wand did a fantastic job creating soft, bouncy waves that last.

I do like the sleek look, with a nice blue led and a sleek matte black finish, giving a luxurious look.

If you're looking for a styling tool that delivers volume and quick heat-up, this one's definitely worth trying.

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. What a gorgeous sleek curling wand. I love the feel and the weight of this curling wand. The 1.5 barrel is perfect for my hair length. It even comes with a glove so that you can hold your hair in place. This curling wand beeps when you plug it in. The wand also has a light so that you know it is plugged in. Even though it beeps when you plug it in, you have to turn the switch on. It will then flash it light and then heat up. It heats up super fast and beeps when it is ready to use. In less than 30 seconds this thing is ready to use. At first it did take some practice, but once I got the hang of it, WOW volume! I use it on the side and the curls went outward and I flip the wand to get the curls to be face framing, again takes some practice, but I finally got it. THen I tried it on my bangs! WOW! Look at the volume and lift I got on my hair! I have wavy curls, but my bangs are flat and this really helped to give lift and I just love how quickly and easy I have curls and volume. I used some product and the lift and curls lasted all day. Again a gorgeous tool that will serve my hair well. This curling wand gets super hot, so highly recommend to use the glove provided, but it is thin, so I recommend using a cotton glove. I also love that the wand has a lip so that it does not burn your counter. Great design!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fast heat time and providing lift and volume to limp hair
